AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cabin Boy
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a space pirate ship. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood doing various small jobs around the ship, where [PAWN_pronoun] became something of a mascot for the crewmen.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shipwrecked
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was on a pirate spaceship that was destroyed in a battle. [PAWN_pronoun] was the only survivor, crashing somewhere on a forsaken Rim World, where [PAWN_pronoun] had to fend for [PAWN_objective]self for years before being rescued by a Golden Age pirate chapter.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Navy Cadet
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] enlisted in a spacefaring country's navy at a young age, where [PAWN_pronoun] received an education as well as combat training. [PAWN_pronoun] exited the service as an adult.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Escaped Slave
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Born to a minor slave owning clan, [PAWN_nameDef] was abducted from [PAWN_possessive] home as a teenager and enslaved by space pirates. When [PAWN_possessive] captors were themselves killed by pirates, [PAWN_pronoun] joined the pirate crew that liberated [PAWN_objective], and followed them when they settled as a Golden Age chapter.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Captain's Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a pirate spaceship as the illegitimate child of a pirate captain. [PAWN_possessive] father kept [PAWN_objective] on the ship and spared no expense in [PAWN_possessive] upbringing, regardless of whether or not [PAWN_pronoun] ultimately decided to become a pirate [PAWN_objective]self.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young Treasure Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: On [PAWN_posessive] home world, [PAWN_nameDef] found a treasure map as a child and spent [PAWN_possessive] whole childhood trying to find the treasure. [PAWN_pronoun] failed, but [PAWN_pronoun] eventually ran across some space pirates and joined them instead. He would later leave that to join Golden Age pirates, due to nostalgia for [PAWN_possessive] youth.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate Cook
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the only chef onboard [PAWN_possessive] pirate spaceship. Most of [PAWN_possessive] time was spent cooking for the crew. [PAWN_pronoun] transferred these skills on land when [PAWN_pronoun] joined some Golden Age pirates.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate Officer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was among the high ranking officers of [PAWN_possessive] space pirate crew, and became accustomed to giving orders. Seeking a bigger challenge than flying around space in a can, [PAWN_pronoun] touched down on a Rim World and formed [PAWN_possessive] own Golden Age pirate chapter.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cursed Pirate
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: During a raid with his space pirate crew, [PAWN_nameDef] came into possession of a great treasure. Unbeknownst to [PAWN_objective], it was cursed! [PAWN_nameDef] spent many years stuck as an undead lifeform before managing to break the curse. This time has had some residual effects on [PAWN_possessive] body and mind.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Treasure Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Unlike most Golden Age pirates, [PAWN_nameDef] never set foot on a spaceship. Rather, [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] adult life searching for a hidden treasure on this Rim World without success. When a local Golden Age pirate chapter offered [PAWN_objective] a chance to attain vast treasures, he immediately jumped on the opportunity.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Marooned
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was captain of a pirate spaceship until being overthrown in a mutiny by [PAWN_possessive] first mate. The mutineers proceeded to abandon [PAWN_objective] on some far-flung Rim World, where [PAWN_pronoun] survived for months until a Golden Age pirate chapter rescued [PAWN_objective]. By the time the remaining loyal crewmen took back the ship, [PAWN_nameDef] was presumed dead.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mutineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was once the first mate on a spaceship. He led a mutiny against the captain of [PAWN_possessive] crew, taking his place as leader. [PAWN_nameDef] then marooned the captain by ejecting him onto a Rim World, cruelly leaving him to die. When the captain's supporters retook the ship, [PAWN_nameDef] stole as much loot as [PAWN_pronoun] could and ejected [PAWN_objective]self onto the nearest habitable planet.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate Doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as the chief medical expert of a crew of space pirates. Before [PAWN_nameDef] joined, [PAWN_pronoun] had no formal training and relied primarily on herbal remedies and other folk knowledge. Since [PAWN_pronoun] was not seeking to broaden [PAWN_pronoun] skills beyond traditional medicine, [PAWN_pronoun] was replaced with a more open-minded doctor. His skills were perfect for the shoestring budget of Golden Age pirates, however.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gentleman Corsair
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a captain of a crew of space pirates. Despite being a thief, [PAWN_pronoun] became well known for [PAWN_possessive] mercy and civility to [PAWN_possessive] foes, as well as for [PAWN_possessive] surprising intelligence and craftiness. Though [PAWN_pronoun] has since gone straight and touched down on this Rim World, [PAWN_pronoun] remains a skilled fighter.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shanghaied
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Unlike most Golden Age pirates, [PAWN_nameDef] has never set foot on a spacer's pirate ship, having grown up on this Rim World. This is because [PAWN_pronoun] was kidnapped by Golden Age pirates while passed out drunk, after which [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to join the crew. [PAWN_pronoun] came to love his new job and never left.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Navy Traitor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served in a spacefaring navy for a few years before deciding the life wasn't for [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] jumped ship at port and joined up with a space pirate crew. After that, [PAWN_pronoun] headed off at a terrestrial smuggler's port and joined up with a Golden Age crew.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hurdy Gurdy Player
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a musician hired by spacefarers, meant to comfort and boost morale in the long voyages of space. [PAWN_pronoun] specialized playing an ancient Old Earth machine called the Hurdy Gurdy, which is akin to a violin with a hand-cranked apparatus and keyboard controlling its notes' pitch instead of a bow. The ship's crew loved [PAWN_objective] and [PAWN_pronoun] rarely had to do any real work around the ship.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Smuggler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be a space pirate who smuggled goods across the stars. This required a lot of fast talking and fast sailing to avoid arrest. Eventually, [PAWN_pronoun] grew tired of that life and settled down with some Golden Age pirates, taking [PAWN_possessive] invaluable spacer skills with [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Vintage Pirate Arms Dealer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] built and sold ancient guns and other millinea-old weapons to anyone with enough Silver to buy them. Though obsolete, [PAWN_nameDef]'s work was considered amongst the best in [PAWN_possessive] solar system. Even spacer pirates were known to use [PAWN_possessive] cutlasses for hand-to-hand combat when boarding a spaceship.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Boarder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Before landing on a Rim World, [PAWN_nameDef] was a space pirate. [PAWN_pronoun] always volunteered to join boarding parties when attacking another ship. In spite of [PAWN_possessive] spacesuit, [PAWN_pronoun] was a terrifying opponent and by far the ship's best fighter.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cannoneer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was in charge of manning the rail gun cannons on [PAWN_possessive] pirate spaceship. [PAWN_pronoun] was known as quite the marksman. Those skills transferred effortlessly onto the Rim when [PAWN_pronoun] joined a Golden Age pirate chapter after a falling out with [PAWN_possessive] space pirate captain.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cannoneer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was in charge of manning the artillery in the navy of [PAWN_posessive} homeland. [PAWN_pronoun] was known as quite the marksman.
